channel.title: Others on Engimo
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Engimo

item.title: Configuration File: config.toml
item.description: This is the Engimo’s configuraion file ( config.toml ) file of this site: baseURL = "http://www.dneg.org/" title = "Engimo" # for smart copyright line, leave this blank and check [params.copyright] copyright = "" theme = "engimo" disqusShortname = "" googleAnalytics = "" Paginate = 5 preserveTaxonomyNames = true enableRobotsTXT = true # generate robots.txt # Syntax Highlighting ( https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/ ) pygmentsCodefences = true enableEmoji = true # Missing translations will default to this content language defaultContentLanguage = "en" [params.
